p: Immature BMDCs were stimulated with PBS as a negative control, 0.625, 1.25, 2.5, and 5 μg/mL EcML, 1 μg/mL LPS or 0.5% Triton X-100 (as a positive control) for 24 h at 37 °C. Cell viability was measured using Trypan blue stain 0.4% with the Countess TM automated cell counter (Thermo Fisher Scientific, Waltham, MA, USA).
